title: Petersburg National Battlefield: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Ranger Programs   1 Photos  Ranger Programs          Recreation Photos   2 Photos  Examples of the many recreational activities visitors can partake in at the Battlefield.          Civil War Fortifications   3 Photos  Examples of Civil War fortifications around the City of Petersburg.            General Grant's HQ at City Point   2 Photos  One of the four units of Petersburg National Battlefield. General Grant's Headquarters is located in Hopewell, Virginia.          Nature and Science Gallery   18 Photos            NPS Centennial Media Quality Images   4 Photos  Petersburg National Battlefield provides opportunities for visitors to learn about the longest military event of the Civil War: The Siege of Petersburg, and also explore and experience the wonderful natural resources of central Virginia by hiking or bicycling on the numerous nature trails found within the 2700 acre park.
